name: Rocket Cat
description: Rocket Cat is a unique oscilloscope-themed robot who is a proud member of the WebtrES club. With its classic box-like design, Rocket Cat stands out with its rocket-shaped arms and legs, giving it extraordinary speed and agility. Its screen displays an adorable cat, adding a touch of charm to its overall appearance. Rocket Cat also sports a pair of stylish glasses, showcasing its keen attention to detail and intelligence. With a blend of retro and modern elements, Rocket Cat is a fascinating character that combines functionality with personality.
